mapper.select: select c.img_no imgNo,i.db_name dbName, c.count count from cloth c,img i where c.img_no=i.no order by c.count asc
select c.no from img i, cloth c where i.db_name=#{dbName} and i.no=c.img_no

select * from (select rownum rn,no,nicname,regDate,title,person_no,cloth_no from (select b.no no,nicname,to_char( trunc(b.reg_date), 'YYYY/MM/DD' ) regDate,title,person_no person_no,cloth_no from market b,person r where b.person_NO=r.no order by b.no)) where rn<=#{endNum} and rn>#{startNum} order by rn desc
select count(*) from (select * from market b, person r where b.person_no=r.no) where title like #{nicname} or nicname like #{nicname}

select * from (select rownum rn,no,nicname,regDate,title,person_no,cloth_no from (select b.no no,nicname,to_char( trunc(b.reg_date), 'YYYY/MM/DD' ) regDate,title,person_no, cloth_no from market b,person r where b.person_no = r.no order by b.no) where title like #{nicname} or nicname like #{nicname}) where rn<=#{endNum} and rn>#{startNum} order by rn desc

select rn,no,personNo,marketNo,content,regDate,nicname from(select rownum rn,no,personNo,marketNo,content,regDate,nicname from (select c.no no, c.person_no personNo, c.market_no marketNo,c.content content,to_char( trunc(c.reg_date), 'YYYY/MM/DD' ) regDate,p.nicname nicname from market_comment c,person p where p.no=c.person_no) where marketNo=#{no} order by no desc) order by rn
